Reviews.Author: preston
Reviews.Content: Web browsing is ridiculously slow but runs game apps and Netflix or hulu pretty well.holds a good charge just to slow on the net
Reviews.Title: way to slow on the web

Reviews.Author: Kimberly Sylvia
Reviews.Content: Its a good tablet for my mother and mother in law i was under the impression that it came with the little cup for a speaker, but did not see it in the box. A little bit of false advertisement i think, but its good deal for the price.
Reviews.Title: False Advertisement

Reviews.Author: Abraham Moses Genen
Reviews.Content: Thus far it seems to be working well. The instructions provided were wholly inadequate. When I called the company for assistance I was given an inadequate explanation of operations. Thus far I haven't figured our how to transfer music from my desktop and play my music.
Reviews.Title: Seems OK
